DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study improve antibiotic prescribing practice Mexican primary care physicians patient seek care acute respiratory tract infection ( ARIs ) . The investigator employ combination qualitative quantitative method develop evaluate patient education physician decision-support intervention . Hypothesis 1 : The investigator identify barrier facilitator appropriate antibiotic use ARIs address patient education physician decision-support . Hypothesis 2 : The proportion patient report desire antibiotic `` important '' reason seek care decrease 50 % 30 % follow exposure educational intervention ; 90 % ( 95 % confidence interval : 80 % 100 % ) patient report trust information provide computer . Hypothesis 3 : Antibiotic prescribing adult uncomplicated acute bronchitis decrease 80 percent 40 percent follow introduction real-time clinical decision support tool .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Antibiotic Prescribing Practices Mexican Primary Care Clinics
